text: Nijat may refer to *Nijat (given name) *Nijat Abasov, Azerbaijani chess grandmaster *Nijat Mamedov, Azerbaijani chess grandmaster *Nijat Kabul F.C., an association football club based in Kabul, Afghanistan *Nijat Sirel, Turkish sculptor *Operation Rah-e-Nijat, a 2009 military operation in Pakistan
title: Nijat
